syntax:
data option a = Some { contents: a } | None
data bool = True | False
data list a = Cons { head: a; tail: list a} | Nil

val rec find [a] (consumes l: list a, f: a -> bool): option a =
  match explain l with
  | Nil ->
      None
  | Cons { head; tail } ->
      if f head then
        Some { contents = head }
      else
        None
  end
